text: For today only B&H Photovideo has on sale the SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B (2 Pack) for only $229.98, down from the regular price of $319.98Features include;512GB Storage CapacityMax Read Speed: 1700 MB/sMax Write Speed: 1400 MB/sRecords Raw 4K VideoCompatible with Select XQD DevicesDownloadable Photo Recovery SoftwarePurchase the SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B (2 Pack) for only $229.98Designed to deliver speeds necessary for working with smooth, raw 4K video captures at resolutions up to 4096 x 2160, the 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B from SanDisk provides read speeds of up to 1700 MB/s and write speeds of up to 1400 MB/s, which enables low latency during high-speed recording and an enhanced workflow efficiency. html:
For today only B&H Photovideo has on sale the SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B (2 Pack) for only $229.98, down from the regular price of $319.98

Features include;

  • 512GB Storage Capacity
  • Max Read Speed: 1700 MB/s
  • Max Write Speed: 1400 MB/s
  • Records Raw 4K Video
  • Compatible with Select XQD Devices
  • Downloadable Photo Recovery Software

Purchase the SanDisk 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B (2 Pack) for only $229.98

Designed to deliver speeds necessary for working with smooth, raw 4K video captures at resolutions up to 4096 x 2160, the 512GB Extreme PRO CFexpress Card Type B from SanDisk provides read speeds of up to 1700 MB/s and write speeds of up to 1400 MB/s, which enables low latency during high-speed recording and an enhanced workflow efficiency. This card is also backward compatible with select XQD cameras that adopt firmware to enable CFexpress. In the event of accidental file deletion, SanDisk's RescuePRO Deluxe data recover software is available as a free download.

Please check with the manufacturer of your particular camera to ensure CFexpress compatibility.

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
